name: Attuma
aliases: Attuma the Barbarian, Lords of the Murky Depths, Nerkkod: Breaker of Oceans
powersText:
Expert hand-to-hand combatant
Superhuman strength, agility, stamina, reflexes and endurance
High level swimming speed
Specially developed vision
Self-propelled flight
Underwater and land adaptation
Access to highly advanced weaponry
